about_the_game:
I know it isn't Christmas yet, but we just couldn't wait!
Santa came early, and left Free DLC under the tree for you!

This Christmas DLC is a single-song pack.
It doesn't have an arena challenge, and there isn't any gear to unlock...
But, it does have... some experiments. Some... oddities.

It's... let's say, New.

Playable in Freeplay Mode and Story Modes, here comes "Deck The Dubstep", by Andross!

Getcho festive hat on!!!
detailed_description:
I know it isn't Christmas yet, but we just couldn't wait!
Santa came early, and left Free DLC under the tree for you!

This Christmas DLC is a single-song pack.
It doesn't have an arena challenge, and there isn't any gear to unlock...
But, it does have... some experiments. Some... oddities.

It's... let's say, New.

Playable in Freeplay Mode and Story Modes, here comes "Deck The Dubstep", by Andross!

Getcho festive hat on!!!

fullgame.name: The Metronomicon: Slay The Dance Floor

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Intel-based Mac running Mac OS X 10.7.3 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB, OpenGL 1.5+
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: One that allows sound to come out of a sound maker
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: You can use the following controllers for this game; M/K, Xbox 360 Controller, Xbox One Controller, PS3/PS4 controllers, PS3/4 Rock Band Guitars, XB Rock Band Guitars, our Custom "The Metronomicon" Dance Pad, plus the majority of USB Dance Pads (sadly we haven't tested them all so there is no guarantee on these)

name: The Metronomicon - Deck the Dubstep

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB, OpenGL 1.5+
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: One that allows sound to come out of a sound maker
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: You can use the following controllers for this game; M/K, Xbox 360 Controller, Xbox One Controller, PS3/PS4 controllers, PS3/4 Rock Band Guitars, XB Rock Band Guitars, our Custom "The Metronomicon" Dance Pad, plus the majority of USB Dance Pads (sadly we haven't tested them all so there is no guarantee on these)

short_description: I know it isn't Christmas yet, but we just couldn't wait! Santa came early, and left Free DLC under the tree for you!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
